enWisdom: Yielding to anger is the cause of destruction

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِنْ أَطَعْتُمْ سَوْرَةَ الْغَضَبِ أَوْرَدَتْكُمْ نِهَايَةَ الْعَطَبِ
enWisdom: Verily if you obey the vehemence of anger, it will lead you to the utmost destruction

Wisdom: ضِرَامُ نَارِ الْغَضَبِ يَبْعَثُ عَلَى رُكُوبِ الْعَطَبِ
enWisdom: The raging fire of anger leads to the embarking of destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَ عَلَيْهِ الْغَضَبُ لَمْ يَأْمَنِ الْعَطَبَ
enWisdom: One who is overpowered by his anger is not safe from destruction

Wisdom: مَنْ غَلَبَ عَلَيْهِ غَضَبُهُ تَعَرَّضَ لِعَطَبِهِ
enWisdom: One whose anger overpowers him is susceptible to its harm
